com.group17.game.core

Class LevelRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group17.game.core.LevelRenderer

  • public class LevelRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of this class is to draw out the game itself. Defines the size of sprite's and of the canvas.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Laurence Rawlings

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image getSprite(java.lang.String spriteName,
                                                 int width,
                                                 int height)
        Get a sprite's image according to the sprite's filename and set its width and height.
        Parameters:
        spriteName - the sprites filename.
        height - height to load the image.

      • render

        public static void render(Game game,
                          javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas)
        Render the game canvas by drawing on all the sprites and writing required text.
        Parameters:
        game - the game to render the state of.
        canvas - the canvas to draw the frame to.
